docs.snippet: Hertha Berlin have snapped up talented winger Mitchell Weiser from Bayern Munich on a three-year contract, the Bundesliga club said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hertha Berlin have snapped up talented winger Mitchell Weiser from Bayern Munich on a three-year contract, the Bundesliga club said on Thursday.

docs.abstract: Cleveland Cavaliers can likely end city's sports suffering if forward LeBron James and rest of team remain healthy.
